item.title: Asif Mahmud, Mahfuj Alam resign
item.description: Asif Mahmud Shojib Bhuyain and Mahfuj Alam, two student representatives serving as advisers to the interim government, have resigned from their positions as advisers. Local news portals, citing sources at the Chief Adviser’s Office, confirmed the development on Wednesday evening.
